title: unknown directx error which is unfixable ?
body:
so out of nowhere, i receive this error window telling me that theres a unknown directx error when theres nothing wrong with my directx? i try to restart my pc and it doesnt fixes it, i googled other solutions, which also doesnt fixes it, i keep having to "leave" games due to this and i am probably gonna receive bans for something i didnt do.

Edit: ok i just received the low priority punishment, this is actually outragous.
